T02TD2085E:161a-1: tree k'a ya w'ak tsitt'a dhishtha no der sha n'a ma /
T02TD2085E:161a-3: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab ba'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02TD2085E:161a-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2085E:161a-5: slob dpon dam tshig sdom ldan pas //
T02TD2085E:161a-6: legs bshams mdun du mandala la ;
T02TD2085E:161a-7: / lhag pa'i lha bsam phyi nang gi / mchod bstod gsol gdab byas rjes su //
T02TD2085E:161a-8: bdag mdun tha dad med par bya //
T02TD2085E:161a-9: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang //
T02TD2085E:161a-10: nu ma'i bar du yi ge bzhi //
T02TD2085E:161a-12: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2085E:161b-0: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes @161b bsdu //
T02TD2085E:161b-1: yon phul gsol gdab byas pa yis //
T02TD2085E:161b-2: slob ma rjes su gzung bar bya //
T02TD2085E:161b-3: yi ge bzhi las bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02TD2085E:161b-4: slob ma'i gnas bzhir rim gyis dbab //
T02TD2085E:161b-5: de yi mthu dang nus pa yis //
T02TD2085E:161b-6: snang gsal bde dang ro gcig pa //
T02TD2085E:161b-7: rim bzhin nyams su myong ba yis //
T02TD2085E:161b-8: lus ngag yid gsum bag chags bcas //
T02TD2085E:161b-9: ma lus spangs nas rdo rje bzhi'i //
T02TD2085E:161b-10: dngos grub g-yo med thob pa na //
T02TD2085E:161b-11: bde chen 'di ni bde ba che //
T02TD2085E:161b-12: 'di las gzhan pa'i bde ba gang //
T02TD2085E:161b-13: gzhan du yod pa ma yin zhes //
T02TD2085E:161b-14: rdo rje'i dgra yis rnam par bsgrag / de rjes phyag rgyas mandala dbul //
T02TD2085E:161b-15: phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi yis //
T02TD2085E:161b-17: nam mkha' lta bur mtha' dbus spang //
T02TD2085E:161b-19: thams cad phyag rgya chen por shog / slob ma rjes su gzung ba lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2085E:161b-21: // / yul dbus kyi pandi ta a'a nanda bha dra dang /
T02TD2085E:161b-22: bod kyi lo ts'a ba se tsha bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis grong khyer chen po ti ra ha te'i lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par bsgyur cing bcos te gtan la phab pa'o /
T02TD2085E:161b-25: // / slar yang grub thob karna shr'i'i zhal sda nas mnyan te thar pa lo ts'a ba gnas brtan nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis shr'i na lendra'i gtsug lag khang chen por dag par bsgyur ba'o//
